    • Method Detail

      • createColumnDefinition

        public ColumnDefinition createColumnDefinition(String columnName,
                                               SQLDataType columnDataType)
        Description copied from interface: DefinitionFactory
        Creates a new definition of column with specified name and data type. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking DefinitionFactory.createColumnDefinition(String, SQLDataType, String, Boolean) and pass null and true as last two parameters (meaning that there is no default value for column, and it may have NULL values).
        Specified by:
        createColumnDefinition in interface DefinitionFactory
        Parameters:
        columnName - The name of the column.
        columnDataType - The data type of the column.
        Returns:
        The syntax element for definition of column with specified name and data type.
        See Also:
        DefinitionFactory.createColumnDefinition(String, SQLDataType, String, Boolean)

      • createColumnDefinition

        public ColumnDefinition createColumnDefinition(String columnName,
                                               SQLDataType columnDataType,
                                               Boolean mayBeNull)
        Description copied from interface: DefinitionFactory
        Creates a new definition of column with specified name, data type, and NULL value policy. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking DefinitionFactory.createColumnDefinition(String, SQLDataType, String, Boolean) and pass null and mayBeNull as last two parameters (meaning that there is no default value for column).
        Specified by:
        createColumnDefinition in interface DefinitionFactory
        Parameters:
        columnName - The name of the column.
        columnDataType - The data type of the column.
        mayBeNull - The NULL value policy. Setting this to false is same as specifying NOT NULL in column definition in SQL.
        Returns:
        The syntax element for definition of column with specified name, data type, and NULL value policy.
        See Also:
        DefinitionFactory.createColumnDefinition(String, SQLDataType, String, Boolean)

      • createColumnDefinition

        public ColumnDefinition createColumnDefinition(String columnName,
                                               SQLDataType columnDataType,
                                               String columnDefault)
        Description copied from interface: DefinitionFactory
        Creates a new definition of column with specified name, data type, default value. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking DefinitionFactory.createColumnDefinition(String, SQLDataType, String, Boolean) and pass columnDefault and true as last two parameters (meaning that column may have NULL values).
        Specified by:
        createColumnDefinition in interface DefinitionFactory
        Parameters:
        columnName - The name of the column.
        columnDataType - The data type of the column.
        columnDefault - The default value of the column.
        Returns:
        The syntax element for definition of column with specified name, data type, default value.
        See Also:
        DefinitionFactory.createColumnDefinition(String, SQLDataType, String, Boolean)

      • createColumnDefinition

        public ColumnDefinition createColumnDefinition(String columnName,
                                               SQLDataType columnDataType,
                                               String columnDefault,
                                               Boolean mayBeNull)
        Description copied from interface: DefinitionFactory
        Creates a new definition of column with specified name, data type, default value, and NULL value policy. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking DefinitionFactory.createColumnDefinition(String, SQLDataType, Boolean, AutoGenerationPolicy) and pass null as last parameter.
        Specified by:
        createColumnDefinition in interface DefinitionFactory
        Parameters:
        columnName - The name of the column.
        columnDataType - The data type of the column.
        columnDefault - The default value of the column.
        mayBeNull - The NULL value policy for the column. Setting this to false is same as specifying NOT NULL in column definition in SQL.
        Returns:
        The syntax element for definition of column with specified name, data type, default value, and NULL value policy.

      • createColumnDefinition

        public ColumnDefinition createColumnDefinition(String columnName,
                                               SQLDataType columnDataType,
                                               Boolean mayBeNull,
                                               AutoGenerationPolicy autoGenerationPolicy)
        Description copied from interface: DefinitionFactory
        Creates a new definition of column with specified name, data type, NULL value policy, and auto generation policy.
        Specified by:
        createColumnDefinition in interface DefinitionFactory
        Parameters:
        columnName - The name of the column.
        columnDataType - The data type of the column.
        mayBeNull - The NULL value policy for the column. Setting this to false is same as specifying NOT NULL in column definition in SQL.
        autoGenerationPolicy - The policy for auto generation for this column. Should be null if the column should not be marked as automatically generated.
        Returns:
        The syntax element for definition of column with specified name, data type, default value, NULL value policy, and auto generation policy.

      • createTableConstraintDefinition

        public TableConstraintDefinition createTableConstraintDefinition(String name,
                                                                 TableConstraint constraint)
        Description copied from interface: DefinitionFactory
        Creates a new, named table constraint without any ConstraintCharacteristics. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking DefinitionFactory.createTableConstraintDefinition(String, TableConstraint, ConstraintCharacteristics) and passing null as last parameter.
        Specified by:
        createTableConstraintDefinition in interface DefinitionFactory
        Parameters:
        name - The name for the constraint.
        constraint - The constraint for the table.
        Returns:
        The syntax element for named table constraint without any ConstraintCharacteristics.
        See Also:
        DefinitionFactory.createColumnDefinition(String, SQLDataType, String, Boolean)

      • createTableConstraintDefinition

        public TableConstraintDefinition createTableConstraintDefinition(TableConstraint constraint)
        Description copied from interface: DefinitionFactory
        Creates a new unnamed table constraint without any ConstraintCharacteristics. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking DefinitionFactory.createTableConstraintDefinition(String, TableConstraint, ConstraintCharacteristics) and passing nulls as first and last parameters.
        Specified by:
        createTableConstraintDefinition in interface DefinitionFactory
        Parameters:
        constraint - The constraint for the table.
        Returns:
        The syntax element for unnamed table constraint without any ConstraintCharacteristics.
        See Also:
        DefinitionFactory.createColumnDefinition(String, SQLDataType, String, Boolean)

      • createTableConstraintDefinition

        public TableConstraintDefinition createTableConstraintDefinition(TableConstraint constraint,
                                                                 ConstraintCharacteristics characteristics)
        Description copied from interface: DefinitionFactory
        Creates a new unnamed table constraint with specified ConstraintCharacteristics. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking DefinitionFactory.createTableConstraintDefinition(String, TableConstraint, ConstraintCharacteristics) and passing null as first parameter.
        Specified by:
        createTableConstraintDefinition in interface DefinitionFactory
        Parameters:
        constraint - The constraint for the table.
        characteristics - The constraint characteristics for the constraint.
        Returns:
        The syntax element for unnamed table constraint with specified ConstraintCharacteristics.
        See Also:
        DefinitionFactory.createColumnDefinition(String, SQLDataType, String, Boolean), ConstraintCharacteristics

                                                           SQLDataType columnDataType,
                                                           String columnDefault,
                                                           Boolean mayBeNull,
                                                           AutoGenerationPolicy autoGenerationPolicy)
